sections.name: BENJAMIN STEIN

structuredContent.name: BENJAMIN STEIN
structuredContent.summary: Clinical Informatics Specialist with extensive experience in healthcare IT systems, EHR implementation, and clinical support.

experience.title: Clinical Informatics Specialist
experience.description: Responsible for all systems and technologies at the hospital, including EHR system implementation, user onboarding, and IT support.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst II
experience.description: Provided 24x7 IT support for clinical staff, managed health information systems, and supported remote clinical staff.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst I
experience.description: Supported tele-ICU services, managed integration engines, and provided remote support.
